name: ExtensionCityCodeVitalRecords
title: Extension - City Code Vital Records
description: City expressed as a numeric value.  As of the date of publication, in accordance with the NCHS Instruction Manual Part 8, Vital Records Geographic Classification, 2014 (https://www.cdc.gov/nchs/data/dvs/IMP8_2014.pdf). (Extension)

element.definition: City expressed as a numeric value.  As of the date of publication, in accordance with the NCHS Instruction Manual Part 8, Vital Records Geographic Classification, 2014 (https://www.cdc.gov/nchs/data/dvs/IMP8_2014.pdf). (Extension)
